title: Ordered_Numeric
description: Abstract notional parent class of ordered, numeric types, which are types with ‘<‘ and arithmetic operators defined.
$comments: Defined in Foundation_types IM, abstract, inherits from Ordered, Numeric

infix *.description: Product by `other'. Actual type of result depends on arithmetic balancing rules.

infix +.description: Sum with `other' (commutative). Actual type of result depends on arithmetic balancing rules.

infix -.description: Result of subtracting `other'. Actual type of result depends on arithmetic balancing rules.

infix <.description: Arithmetic comparison. In conjunction with ‘=’, enables the definition of the operators ‘>’, ‘>=’, ‘<=’, ‘<>’. In real type systems, this operator might be defined on another class for comparability.
